thread.title_full: Interhome AG bewertet von Fernan Iba単ez

author: Fernan Iba単ez
title: Fernan Iba単ez
text:
I have not yet occupied the rented house, so I will refer only to the reservation.
Although, in this case, I am not thinking of a cancellation, I did not like the policy of not allowing free cancellation, as it is normally done in Booking. You could establish a deadline for cancellation, but customers feel more confident when the possibility of cancellation is there.
